title: Band, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk on linen; trimmed with linen lace
Technique: embroidered
description: Cover is made up of old pieces; three strips of embroidered linen (animals and angular designs on red ground); two strips of needle lace with border of bobbin lace on two sides and on others, silk fringe in red and white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Band, 17th century.Medium: silk on linen; trimmed with linen lace
Technique: embroidered. Gift of Norvin Hewitt Green. 1938-58-1416-c.
